"Boring," I answer in the monotone essence of Ben Stein. "Boring as always."

"Well, how about we make that suit you've always wanted to build?" he asks. I pop my upper body up. I forgot that Dad promised me we would build my shrinking suit!

"HECK yeah!" I enthusiastically answer. We go downstairs and get the parts necessary for my suit. Dad's the coolest inventor in the world, and I wanna be just like him someday.

After a couple of hours worth of building, the suit is finished. Now I can change my size, see in the dark, fly in the air, and he unbreakable! I put the suit on with an exciting feel in my heart.

"Now promise me that you'll use that suit for scientific purposes, alright?" Dad tells me. "We don't want to freak out anyone."

"No worries, Dad!" I tell him. "I have this under control!" I shrink myself to the size of a gnat and fly to my room.

Now I can explore a girl's body, and they wouldn't notice a thing! The only thing is, who should I explore?

choices: Confirmed your suspects. Fast Food (Normal Teenager)
1153311222.content:
"Seriously? I think i forgot to test the OS before doing this. Let's try it again"

The results showed a large amount of chemicals on it, mostly preservatives. They were normally used in ultra processed food, that only could be found at the 95% of fast food restaurants. The results...
1153311222.title: System Glitch N°2

11533112222.content:
"Suit... i'm getting tired of this... give me results... or else"

This time it showed a large amount of glucose on the bolus, and even it detected some on the stomach walls and in the acids. There is only one kind of person that consumes that amount of sugar. The results showed...
11533112222.title: System Glitch N°3

choices: Choose Steph Tsunade as your host
1153312.content:
The alarms of the suit started to ring loudly as it notifies my suit that the wind is changing direction... As if on cue, I saw that there was a chicken pasta meal on the floor, so I headed straight for it, just when I heard a mid-30's lady shout,
"Is this chicken pasta overcooked or something?! If not, I'm still gonna eat it!" Steph Tsunade yells over the shouts of other giggling ladies as they lounge about in a giant outdoor pool. I heard her loud shout as it rings in my ears, a new opportunity!

Steph Tsunade had purple glasses, long black hair in a ponytail, two hearing-aids and a rather pudgy gut. I could only choose one host though
1153312.title: The wind heads straight for...

12.content:
Name: Sheila
Age: 16-and-a-half
Likes: female endo, Eka's Portal, female body hair, Angry Birds, microscopes
Dislikes: hard vore, spiders, asparagus (except for the asparaguses from VeggieTales, they're cool)


The doorbell rang. I rush to the front door to see if my package came today. I open it to find a huge box on my front porch. I take it in and open it up with my bare hands. At last, the shrink suit I ordered from eBay arrived!

I put it on and try it out. I jump, and I hover in the air. Looks like the flying works out! I go in my closet with the lights out. The suit glows on its own. Looks like glowing in the dark works out! I shrink to the size of a gnat. The shrinking works out! I couldn't find anything to test if the suit makes me invincible or not, but I bet it works!

Now I can go inside my friends or complete strangers without them even knowing it. It's what I've always dreamed of! Luckily, Mom and Dad are on a business trip throughout the whole week, so I can use this to my will. On the downside, I have to be in charge of the house while they're gone. Big woop.

However, my 13-year-old sister, Carly, can take care of the house while I go and do my thing. I fly to her room and resize myself to normal. It looks like she's working on her homework. I knock on the door rim since the door's open. She turns her head to me.

She has brown braided hair, brown eyes, freckles, and a tiny nose, just like me, but shorter.

"Carly, you're in charge," I tell her.

"But, why?" she asked. "I thought Mom and Dad put you in charge." She looks at the suit I'm wearing. "Hey, you got your shrink suit! Cool!"

"Yeah, I know," I respond, "and I wanna test it out, so I want you to be in charge while I explore. On the positive side, you get to be responsible of yourself!"

Carly stared at me. "Okay," she said.

"Perfect. See you in a bit!" I shrink back to the size of a gnat. My journey has begun.

Now who can I explore?
12.title: Sheila

121.content:
I fly out of my house and head for Jamie's.

Jamie is my 17-year-old best friend. She has long brown hair, blue eyes, glasses, C cup breasts, and a white person's nose. We've been friends since first grade, and she's got some mighty fine body hair. I even have to ask her every time I want to look at her body hair, and she's perfectly fine with it.

I make it to Jamie's house. The window to her room is open, so I fly through it. I shrink to the size of a virus to make sure I don't call attention to myself.

I see Jamie asleep. She's resting on her back. Her right arm is up, exposing her armpit, while her left arm rests on her belly. She's in her underwear as well. I've seen her sleep in her underwear before, so this doesn't phase me.

This makes her a perfect host. The only thing is, where should I go?
121.title: Jamie

1211.content:
I decided to go up Jamie's nose. I looked up it before, so going in it ought to be an amazement.

I fly up to her nostrils, gazing at her long, thick nasal hairs. Anything that tries to get in her nose gets blocked out by her bodyguard nasal hairs. I can see the bacteria, dust, and viruses trying to get in her nose, but the hairs stop them right in their tracks.

I'm getting giddy to fly up her nose and see the wonders it holds. The thing is I can't pick a nostril to go in.
1211.title: Jamie's Nasal Bodyguards

choices: Ride one of the dead skin cells
1212.content:
Jamie's left arm looks close enough, so I'll go with that.

I fly closer to Jamie's arm. A breeze enters through the window, causing the hairs on her arm stand up as straight as the Washington Monument. Bumps appear on the skin, supporting the hairs.

I land on Jamie's arm, observing the new landscape. The hairs are now branch-free trees pointing at the ceiling. Some old skin cells drift off into the sky; who knows where they'll end up.

I see a small opening filled with newer cells. I really wanna go in there and see the layers of Jamie's skin, but there's also going in a hair follicle to see how her arm hair is standing up straight.

What to do, what to do?
1212.title: Destination: Straight Forest

choices: Give her a call and see if she's interested
Cheyenne gets up from her bed and goes somewhere else (follow her)
122.content:
I'll give Cheyenne a visit. She wouldn't care anyways.

Cheyenne is 19-and-a-half years old. She has long blonde hair, Asian bluish-hazel eyes, a chubby body, DD cup breasts, and a forest of body hair that you can only see up close. We're close friends, and she doesn't seem to give a s#!t about anything.

I fly out of the house and head for Cheyenne's house, which is right next door. The window to her room is open, so I fly through there. I see her in a black t-shirt and baggy jeans, sitting on her bed with her phone. She must be on social media because I usually see her on her phone like that.

I really want to explore her body, but I don't know whether to immediately explore now or call her up and see if she's interested.
122.title: Cheyenne

1221.content:
I couldn't help it. Cheyenne has the perfect body to explore! The minuscule hairs that are all over her sells out for me.

The only problem is, I don't know where to go; there's so many options!
1221.title: Screw it. I'm exploring her.

12211.content:
I settled for Cheyenne's nose.

I did the best I can to fly towards her nose without her noticing me (then again, if she did notice me, she wouldn't mind me flying up her nose).

I approach her nostrils, gazing upon the glory of her nasal hairs. A plentiful of hairs guard the wet caverns with all their might, making sure no intruders dare step foot in their territory.

I kept hovering towards her nostrils, wanting to explore her body so bad. Little before I know it, I find myself trapped in the nasal hairs of Cheyenne's...
12211.title: Nasal Settlement

1222.content:
Going inside her without permission might be rude, so I'll call her to not be so intrusive. I pull out my cell phone, go to my contacts, find Cheyenne's number, and call her. Since I'm close to her, her phone rang quickly. She noticed that I'm calling her, and she answers the phone.

"Hello?" she responded.

"Heya Cheyenne," I answer. "I just want to ask you something."

"Okay, spill it," she said.

"Alright, here we go," I said. My head is stirring because I know what to say, but I don't know how to say it. Oh well, I guess I'll just wing it. "My shrinking suit came in today, and I'm trying it out. Can I explore your body while I'm at it?"

"Sure, I don't care," she answered. YES!!! I have her permission! "By the way, what's the suit like?"

"Well, it can make me shrink and grow any size, make me fly, and make me practically invincible," I respond. "By the way, you wanna see me now?"

"Okay." I fly up to her face. I take notice of all the pores on her face, and even some tiny hairs sprouting out of them. A barely noticeable mustache on her philtrum (the spot between the nose and upper lip) is in brighter detail, and I think I can see some of her nose hairs sprouting out of her nostrils.

Cheyenne's eyes widen by how small I am. "Geez, you weren't kidding! Okay, have fun exploring my body."

She hangs up and lies her back on her bed, dangling her legs. Her t-shirt stretches back, exposing her enormous belly. It rises up and down whenever she breathes in and out. Her right arm is lifted, her elbow bent, and her hand holding her phone close to her face.

It's time for exploring, but where to?
1222.title: Gotta Let Her Know

12221.content:
I decided to go in Cheyenne's mouth. I'm not sure how I'm gonna get in there since her mouth is closed at the moment.

Suddenly, I notice her eyes getting weary. She turns off her phone, puts it in her pocket, and falls asleep. Her mouth is slightly open while she naps, so I think this should be good enough.

I fly up to her mouth, feeling her breathing brush against me. I think I can smell what she had for lunch.

I fly into her mouth, marveling over her pearly white teeth and her uvula dangling at the back of her mouth. Saliva begins to produce. Her breath still hits me, though. Guess that's what I get for getting super close to her mouth.

I can always fly into the back of her throat and go down either her esophagus or her trachea. Then again, I could go in a taste bud on her tongue.
12221.title: Trip to Cheyenne's Mouth

12223.content: It's hard to decide where to explore you're friend, especially if you have their permission.
12223.title: Somewhere else

122232.content:
Cheyenne's belly is exposed, so I might as well go there.

I fly to her belly and land on it. I can feel it rising up an down whenever she breathes in and out. Tiny hairs on her skin stand erect. I place my ear on her belly, hearing the rumbling from within; it sounds like her digestive system is at work, breaking down whatever she ate to provide her the energy she needs to make it through the day.

I look around to see some openings to go through: her shirt and her pants.

This is only the beginning of exploring Cheyenne's body, and I know where to go from here.
122232.title: The Rising Belly of the Beauty

122233.content: Where to go, where to go...
122233.title: Somewhere eIse

1222333.content:
This is getting pretty difficult.

I have no idea where to go!
1222333.title: Somewhere else

12223333.content: I don't know if I'm running out of options or not.
12223333.title: Somewhere else

124.content:
I stay in the doorway of Carly's room. I fly to her desk and shrink to the size of a virus so she can't see me. It looks like she's doing some algebra problems. They don't seem to be hard...for me.

Carly taps her head with her pencil. It looks like she's been stuck on problem 1 all this time. I'd help her now, but I'm too busy staring at her gorgeous, hairy arms. The hairs are like trees in the rain forest. This makes me so jealous! Why can't my arms be like that?

That's beside the point. I need to get inside Carly somehow.
124.title: Carly

125.content: There's gotta be someone I can explore, but who to pick?
125.title: More of Sheila's Friends

1253.content: Still deciding on someone, just give me a sec...
1253.title: Someone else

info.brief_description: Hector and Sheila wanna shrink themselves and explore the inside of their (girl)friends.
info.description:
Once upon a time, a weirdo (Hector or Sheila) who's obsessed with the human body (specifically the female body) wants to see the human body in person. He/she wants to do this so bad that he/she built a suit that makes him/her change size, be invincible, fly and light up. Now he/she can make his/her weirdo dreams come true with the excuse of doing this for "scientific purposes."

I originally had this as an interactive on Eka's Portal (https://aryion.com/iss/page.php?page=1&story=745), but I felt like porting it to Writing.com in case if people wanted to continue it from here.

Rules for those who want to add more:

1) Female hosts ONLY. If you want male hosts, look elsewhere.
2) This interactive is in first-person POV, unless if there's a segment that shifts its focus away from the main character.
3) No hard vore, same-size vore, or having the main character get digested alive. The only things that get digested and/or hard vored are bugs.
4) No letting the main character die (They're too young to die, and they have a suit that makes them invincible, after all).
5) PLEASE use proper spelling and grammar!
6) Any host 17 or under shouldn't be put in sexual moments (i.e.: having sex and masturbating) Any host 18 or older can be in sexual moments.
7) Any host 14 or under mustn't have a choice where you can go inside their vagina. Any host 15 or older can have a chapter where you can go inside their vagina.
8) When creating a new host, describe what she looks like and her age. Be sure to follow the two previous rules when it comes to the host's age.
9) No "Journey to the Center of Mind" things. If you want "Journey to the Center of Mind" things, look elsewhere.
10) Have fun and go nuts.

That is all, and I hope you enjoy my interactive!
